name: On-Farm Poultry in the Bitterroot: Breeding to Butchering
blurb: We are requesting funding for a state licensed poultry processing facility with an attached incubation and brooding classroom.

name: Herbal Medicine Matters
blurb: Avena Botanicals is Dedicated to Ensuring that Traditional Herbal Medicine is Accessible to All - Today and Always.

name: Growing Gourmet Mushrooms For the KC Metro
blurb: We are a family run gourmet mushroom farm. We grow our mushrooms with a focus on sustainability by growing them on agricultural waste.

name: Fable: From Farm to Table
blurb: Fable aims to be a year-round source for the freshest produce, all grown locally and without the use of GMOs or harmful pesticides.

name: Smith Story Wine Cellars
blurb: Support the birth of our winery.  Please help us pay our farmers for our first Smith Story Wine Cellars this harvest. Farmers First!

name: Feisty Acres Bobwhite Quail Release Program
blurb: A not-for-profit project that will help restore the natural habitat and population of the Northern Bobwhite Quail on the North Fork.

name: Exceptional grass-finished beef, raised with love in Wyoming
blurb: Support humanely-raised beef and help us expand with our own reefer trailer!

name: The Dreamgoats: Raising a Resilient Herd
blurb: Help raise a herd of organic dairy goats & plant the seeds of a bigger dream!

name: Brave Bear Farm: A Sustainable Montana Farm
blurb: We are building infrastructure needed for our sustainable homestead farm, where we'll raise vegetables, flowers, goats & chickens.

name: Fresh, Antioxidant-packed Olive Oil from Hvar Island
blurb: Our Goal: bring you supremely healthy, antioxidant-packed olive oil quickly and directly from our October harvest on Hvar Island.

name: Stedsans in the Woods
blurb: Restaurant, cabins and permaculture farm in a forest in Sweden. A lab for discovering better ways to eat, live and connect with nature.

name: Grow Green Top Farms & Bring Real Food to More People
blurb: Hydroponic urban farm that connects folks with real food by providing salads with homegrown microgreens that are harvested daily.

name: "Growing for their Future"
blurb: "Changing the way the community eats, one plate at a time"

name: Re-Launch: Grab a Mug, Get a Hug (9 days)
blurb: Discovering coffee growers with an enormous quality potential, and as well a potential of a socio-economic impact in their region.

name: How to Make a Plant Love You: Houseplant Masterclass
blurb: An online audio-visual course and experience to help you demystify plant care and learn how to have a relationship with your plants.

name: Up Top Acres: Rooftop Farming
blurb: We're establishing agriculture as a fixture of city life by turning underutilized rooftops into productive farmland. Join us!

name: Adopt 300 Maple Trees
blurb: Adopt a maple tree and become part of the maple syrup tradition at Kettle Ridge Farm!

name: Amsterdam Honeybees
blurb: Our bees forage nectar in the gardens of old Amsterdam canal houses and in the beautiful UNESCO world heritage Beemster Polder.

name: Chickstarter
blurb: Expanding our Free Range Chicken Farm

name: Jot & Tittle Farms: Customized CSA
blurb: Get your early-bird membership to our CSA, and help us feed low-income families, weekly, locally and organically grown, fresh produce.

name: OliveRoads - Authentic Extra Virgin Olive Oil
blurb: OliveRoads - A Trip to Sicily to receive Nocellara del Belice cultivar ExtraVirgin Olive Oil

name: Thankful Turkey by Miller Farms
blurb: When you purchase a Miller Farms turkey, one will be given to a family in need for Thanksgiving 2020.

name: The Fiorella Familia Little Flower Farm CSA
blurb: The launch of an artful flower bouquet subscription service featuring seasonal flowers, grown right here in southern MN.

name: Cured meat from an ethical, sustainable Vermont Farm
blurb: 2 Italian butchers and farmers transplanted in Vermont bring you cured meats coming from animals raised using sustainable practices

name: Cookery school overlooking the aeolian isles and the sea.
blurb: Sicilian cookery school, immerse in the country side, in front of the sea, the Aeolian isles and surrounded by century-old olive trees.

name: Moonrise Seaweed Co.
blurb: Kickstarting the seaweed industry in South Australia! We are a family business building a pathway to regenerative ocean farming.

name: Creating an agricultural school from the ground up
blurb: A school centering indigenous knowledge where individuals learn how to take care of themselves through taking care of the earth.

name: Help Plant Shop 805 Grow: Putting Down Roots in Ventura!
blurb: Family-owned plant shop needs help to open our doors and bring locally grown plants to our community.

name: 2022 Olive Oil Harvest
blurb: With your support we hope to bring our Extra Virgin Olive Oil from Sicily to the UK again this year.

name: Scaling Regenerative Farming
blurb: Expanding Food Access and Building Soil to Provide Cleaner, Healthier Food and Mitigate Climate Change
